import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NotesList=()=>{const[currentNotes,setCurentNotes]=useState(NOTES);const[isModal,setIsModal]=useState(false);const[newTitle,setNewTitle]=useState('');const[newDescription,setNewDescription]=useState('');const[currentDescription,setCurrentDescription]=useState('');const deleteNote=id=>{setCurentNotes(currentNotes.filter(note=>note.id!==id));};const addNote=()=>{if(newTitle.trim()&&newDescription.trim()){setCurentNotes([...currentNotes,{id:Math.random(),title:newTitle,description:newDescription}]);setNewTitle('');setNewDescription('');setIsModal(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/(// Container for the entire notes list

,placeholder:"Enter note description",className:"p-2 rounded"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"py-2 px-4 bg-white rounded hover:text-indigo-700 transition mt-4",onClick:addNote,children:"Submit"})]})]})]}));};export default NotesList;
